Headline: #52 Kedzie Temporary Reroute near Kedzie/36th
ShortDescription: 52 Kedzie buses temp. rerouted NB: Kedzie, 39th, California, I-55 Exp & Kedzie; SB:  Kedzie, 36th, California & 39th: due to, street blockage near Kedzie/36th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Kedzie/36th.

Northbound buses will operate via Kedzie, 39th, California, I-55 Expressway and Kedzie.

Southbound buses will operate via Kedzie, 36th, California and 39th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Perry
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Wentworth, 119th, Michigan and 115th: due to, street blockage near 115th/Perry.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Wentworth, 119th, Michigan and 115th: due to, street blockage near 115th/Perry.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays & congestion following earlier police activity at O'Hare. Service is resuming, allow extra time

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at O'Hare.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
